content: Couldn’t prepare the file for AI — run preparation again.

comment.text: This text explains why a file couldn't be processed by AI, instructing the user to rerun the preparation process. It appears as informational text accompanying a failed AI preparation indicator, likely within a file processing interface. Translators should maintain the helpful and instructional tone.

usage.context:
<div>
 <Text fontWeight={600} fontSize="12px" lineHeight="16px">
 {t("Common:PreparationForAIFailed")}
 </Text>
 <Text fontSize="12px" lineHeight="16px">
 {t("Common:PreparationForAIFailedInfo")}
 </Text>
 {withRetryVectorization ? (
 <Link
 type={LinkType.action}
 fontWeight={600}
